titles: The Leviathan heretical, or, The charge exhibited in Parliament against M. Hobbs justified by the refutation of a book of his entituled The historical narration of heresie and the punishments thereof by John Dowel.
author: Dowell, John, ca. 1627-1690.
publisher: Printed by L. Lichfield and are to be sold by A. Stephens,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
keywords: Hobbes, Thomas, 1588-1679. --  Historical narration of heresie and the punishment thereof.
